title: Please help with skinny font
content:
Not sure what this font is if anyone can help me... its a little messy (supposed to be smoother) but it gets the point across.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/zeke-font_6053.jpg)
author: Zekeman

comments.content:
It’s a kind of modified Futura.

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel

Hi Zekeman,

this is a school handwriting typeface, American ‘Print’ style.  
You can get this one from [schoolhousefonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105539/http:/www.schoolhousefonts.com/Schoolhouse/characterset.htm). Choose ‘Schoolhouse Set A (Zaner-Bloser style)’.

There are several free fonts of similar style: [Print Clearly](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105539/http:/www.bvfonts.com/fonts/details.php?id=45) from BlueVinyl, or [Primer Print](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105539/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/primer-print/) from [Ray Larabie](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105539/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ray%252BLarabie).

[Don’t use this at school!]

F

Florian,

Thank you much. Used Print Clearly, worked like a charm.
